title: Anything He Wants 4: The Rescue
description: She never expected her new life would be so deadly...When Lucy Delacourt signed a contract with Jeremiah Hamilton, she had no idea she'd be caught up in an assassination plot against the billionaire. Barely surviving poisoned champagne, she is whisked away to a beachfront estate in the Hamptons that is fortified like Fort Knox. Safety comes at a price however - even as she learns more about her enigmatic boss, the billionaire's refusal to let her in on the investigation confuses the still-recovering Lucy. To compound matters, family members seek to drive them apart, straining their tenuous relationship to the breaking point. All the while, a deadly threat lurks in the background...waiting...Aslo published as Collateral Damage
author: Sara Fawkes
